Thousand_Oaks.Walnut Grove Park: Walnut Grove Park is a 6.5 acre community park in Newbury Park, CA, situated immediately south of the U.S. 101 Ventura Freeway on Newbury Road. Named for its many walnut trees, the park land was acquired in 1981 and ultimately developed into a community park in 1994. It contains a playground, an outdoor handball court, three BBQ grills, basketball courts, numerous picnic tables, trails, and open-space.
